channel.title: Rep Return
channel.description: I feel like we need it back, i loved the days of a meaningless number rising on my profile

item.title: Rep Return
item.dc:creator: @Fire_capez Fire capez
item.description:
@Fire_capez wrote:

asshole_rule:

If you’ve been following the news recently, you know that a complete description of the problems with reputation’s arguments would occupy several volumes. However, you might not know that reputation uses words like “scleroticochorioiditis” to give its obloquies an air of culture and elegance. Before I begin, let me point out that I receive a great deal of correspondence from people all over moparscape. One of the things that impresses me about all of it is the massive number of people who realize that reputation’s true goal is to steal the fruits of other people’s labor. All the statements that its servitors make to justify or downplay that goal are only apologetics; they do nothing to keep the faith. Tom may find it inconceivable that its opposition to totalism has been more rhetorical than substantive, but it’ll come to its senses sometime soon. It’s possible that Tom doesn’t realize this because it has been ingrained with so much of alarmism’s propaganda. If that’s the case, I recommend that we ask the tough questions and not shy away from the tough answers. Comments on the above are welcome, but please think them out first.

This reminds me of one those gibberish generators.

This is satire right?

Read full topic
